QuestData.Title: Grasp of the Underking
QuestData.Description: If we have one good fortune in this it is that Dargrul has no knowledge of how to use the hammer.$b$bHe keeps thinking of the hammer as a weapon instead of a tool of creation.$b$bEven so, he has imprisoned our tribesman in fists of stone summoned from the earth. Our weapons have proven useless against this magic.$b$bYou might have power enough to break these fists. Can you help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Jale Rivermane, Warbrave Oro, and Oakin Ironbull.
QuestData.RewardText: It has been an age or more since the drogbar last walked the surface in such numbers.$b$bThey became the dark stories we tell children.
